name: Popover
description: Add small overlay content to any element for housing secondary information. Popover rely on on the 3rd party library tether for positioning.

options.name: text
options.description: A textual content in the popover. This can be Html.

options.name: triggers
options.description: Opens popover based on spcified triggers. If you consider supporting mobile devices than you might need to specify both click and hover trigger, (on desktops click will take priority).
